comments.comments_text: Goal! A rebound wrong foots everyone except Richarlison (Everton), and he slams the ball into the open net from close range. 1:0.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! A rebound wrong foots everyone except [PLAYER] ([TEAM]), and he slams the ball into the open net from close range. 1:0.

comments.comments_text: Wolves have a chance to score from a corner kick, but the ball is cleared by a defender.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] have a chance to score from a corner kick, but the ball is cleared by a defender.

comments.comments_text: Goal! 1:1. Romain Saiss (Wolves) taps home from almost on the goal line after a lucky rebound fell at his feet.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Gylfi Sigurdsson picks out Alex Iwobi (Everton) in the box with a decent cross, and he scores in the roof of the net with a header from close range. 2:1.

comments.comments_text: The referee points to the corner flag. It's a corner to Everton.

comments.comments_text: Raul Jimenez (Wolves) receives a yellow card for a nasty tackle.

comments.comments_text: Ruben Neves (Wolves) swings in the corner, but fails to find any of his teammates. One of the defenders reacts superbly to get it clear.

comments.comments_text: Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton) lifts the ball into the box from the corner, but one of the defending players gets there first to head it clear.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Lucas Digne clips a neat ball into the box in the direction of Richarlison (Everton), who jumps highest and steers a bullet header from the centre of the box into the bottom right corner. Rui Patricio had no chance of stopping that. 3:2.

comments.comments_text: A rebound sits up nicely for Ruben Neves (Wolves), whose shot from distance is blocked by a defender. The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to Wolves.
